arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Benfica Prediction: Will José Mourinho Return to Haunt Blues?
arts.sum: Chelsea are made favourites by the Opta supercomputer when they host Benfica in the UEFA Champions League on Tuesday. Look ahead to the game at Stamford Bridge with our Chelsea vs Benfica prediction and preview. The post Chelsea vs Benfica Prediction: Will José Mourinho Return to Haunt Blues? appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Benfica predictions: Jose to make unhappy Bridge return
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho will be the centre of attention at Stamford Bridge on Tuesday evening, but Ross Kilvington expects Chelsea to ruin the return of the now Benfica head coach.

arts.ttl: Inside Jose Mourinho's Benfica return: Ex-Chelsea boss opens up on 'unfinished business' 25 years on from ill-fated spell after rediscovering his 'cultural level' following Fenerbahce sacking... so, can he prove he's still go it?
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL: Lunchtime in Seixal and after Jose Mourinho's training session with Benfica, we are awaiting his pre-match press conference.

arts.ttl: Chelsea injury, suspension list vs. Benfica: Palmer update, Mourinho reunion
arts.sum: Chalobah is expected to feature in midweek but Maresca continues to contend with defensive absences and a significant blow in attack, as his lengthy injury list shows little sign of easing. Liam Delap remains sidelined with a hamstring problem sustained in late August and is not expected to return before mid-November as his recovery continues.
